installCommand: npm install @elevenlabs/react ai lucide-react class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge nanoid use-stick-to-bottom streamdown @streamdown/cjk @streamdown/code @streamdown/math @streamdown/mermaid next-themes @radix-ui/react-slot

notes.tailwind: This project uses Tailwind CSS v4 with the PostCSS plugin
notes.typescript: Ensure tsconfig.json has path aliases configured: '@/*': ['./*']
notes.audio: Voice features require microphone permissions and Web Audio API support
